content.en: Battery SOC estimation: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to estimate the state of charge of lithium-ion batteries. These algorithms, such as the Unscented Kalman Filtering (UKF) Algorithm, the Adaptive Extend Kalman Filter (AEKF) Algorithm, and the Adaptive Kalman Filter Method, are used to accurately estimate the battery's state of charge. By using these algorithms, scientists hope to improve the performance and efficiency of batteries in various applications, including electric vehicles.
content.da: Batteriets SOC-estimation: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til at estimere opladningstilstanden for lithium-ion-batterier. Disse algoritmer, såsom Unscented Kalman Filtering (UKF) algoritmen, den adaptive forlængede Kalman-filter (AEKF) algoritme og den adaptive Kalman-filtermetode, bruges til nøjagtigt at estimere batteriets opladningstilstand. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber videnskabsfolk at forbedre batteriers ydeevne og effektivitet i forskellige anvendelser, herunder elektriske køretøjer.
